record.field: 28. You have multiple service requests for data entry tasks. Which of the following should be given the top most Priority?
A. Data entry task of the coming week
B. Testing old sets for validation
C. Old data entry important new entry
D. Urgent and important new entry

A. Record the data in the incorrect format
C. Seek advice from database specialist
30. Which of the following is the reason for taking data backup?

ol.li: To protect data from hardware failures
To protect data from accidental loss
To protect data from database corruption

A. Super computer is much larger than mainframe computers
B. Super computers are much smaller than mainframe computers

D. Supercomputers are focused to execute as many programs as possible while mainframe uses its power to execute few programs as fast as possible
